title: Reliance Jio announces ‘Diwali Dhamaka’ offer with 1 year of free AirFiber subscription; see details - BusinessToday
selftext: Designed specifically for minors and children, this scheme allows parents to start investing for their minor kids as early as when they are infants. They have an option to discontinue participation once the child attains the age of 18.
comments:
[A post by Press Information Bureau in Chandigarh on social media platform X (previously Twitter) showed that an annual contribution of Rs 10,000 can give:](https://www.businesstoday.in/personal-finance/investment/story/nps-vatsalya-calculator-annual-investment-of-rs-10000-can-give-you-rs-11-crore-when-your-kid-is-60-yrs-446609-2024-09-19?utm_source=Taboola&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=recirculation)

> Annual Contribution: Rs 10,000
> Investment Duration: 18 years
> Expected Corpus at 18: Rs 5 lakh @10% rate of return (RoR)
> Expected Corpus at 60:
> @10% RoR: Rs 2.75 crore
> @11.59%* RoR: Rs 5.97 crore
> @12.86%# RoR: Rs 11.05 crore

The story link is about NPS Vatsalya scheme by the government. Where did Jio comes in? 

Are you a bot spreading misinformation?
